io.micronaut.aot.core

Annotation Type Option


  • public @interface Option
    Describes a configuration option of a source generator.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String key
      Returns the key used to configure this option.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String description
      Returns a description of this configuration option.
      java.lang.String sampleValue
      Returns a sample value for this option, if any.

    • Element Detail

      • key

        public abstract java.lang.String key
        Returns the key used to configure this option.
        Returns:
        the key, as found in properties

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        Returns a description of this configuration option.
        Returns:
        the description
        Default:
        ""

      • sampleValue

        public abstract java.lang.String sampleValue
        Returns a sample value for this option, if any.
        Returns:
        a sample value
        Default:
        ""
